summary: A unique and creatable gilded steel plate armor for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
I took PhilSchmidheiny\'s \"Ornate Steel Plate\"  resource and I spruced it up, added chain mail and made it a unique and creatable item in Skyrim. This requires the advanced smithing perk to craft; male, female and all race compatible.

A matching set of Helms can be found here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24593]\"Ancestral Helms\"[/url]

If you like this armor, check out my other armor mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32070]\"Blued Steel Plate Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31796]\"Steel Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31803]\"Nordic Carved Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32516]\"Gilded Nordic Carved Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32715]\"Stalhrim with Scalemail\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33772]\"Imperial Legion Reborn\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34040]\"Hero of the Legion\"[/url]


Tremendous appreciation to goes to PhilSchmidheiny for his \"Ornate Steel Plate Armor Texture\" resource that is used for the \"Gilded Steel Plate\" armor. Permission to use these textures is given by PhilSchmidheiny [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12363]here[/url]. Original textures by PhilSchmidheiny, all other work by ViperMkII.
author: ViperMkII
